name: Colmate
description:
This game was made in 2 day for a Game Jam.

You wake up in a strange place, and must find a way out!

Energy cores can be found in some rooms, and you have to collect them to restore energy and open the exit door.

You can move with Q & D.

The main interaction is the LEFT CLICK of the mouse.

Programmer/Game Designer/Sound Designer:

Alexis BASTIERI

2D Artist/Animator:

Manon PECHINE
